rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {3387, L6005} Do Must have passed 72 credit points Otherwise true
Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 07G, 07PG} owned by {50000567}

description: This unit examines the way in which the international community is tackling existing and future environmental problems, including ozone layer depletion, climate change, destruction of biodiversity, world heritage conservation, and disposal of hazardous waste. International and Australian domestic obligations in respect of these various environmental issues will be examined. The development of international environmental law policy will be looked at as well as Australia's profile in international negotiations on environmental matters.
